content: So, what will your choice be...?

You can put your travel sponsorship—
Right back into this machine! <color=#38b6c5>Click "Insert"</color>
for a chance to increase your sponsorship amount!

Just like how you encounter surprises and unexpected things during travels!
In this machine,
we've implemented code that captures the essence of journey!

Just <color=#38b6c5>tap "Collect" on your screen</color>,
and you'll get your travel sponsorship funds!
But wait—don't rush,

Welcome to the Qianfeng Association's—Travel Sponsorship Terminal!
Presenting our special gift to those who journey with Lumia—
The Qianfeng Sponsorship!
